Class EnergyUsageModel

This class is responsible for storing the data that is used by the EnergyUsageViewModel

Saves the current state of the model to the data file in local app data storage through the EnergyUsageFileService.

Returns

Task

Update()

Update the model with the latest energy usage data. Creates a new EnergyUsageLog for the total daily measurement as well as the hourly measurement and adds this to EnergyUsageData which stores all records.

public void Update()
